entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Arctic Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 p.m. EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arctic Bay Airport 2:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A mix of sun and cloud. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
